actions.startGameConfirmation: Are you sure you want to start this tournament? After starting:
actions.startGameWarning1: You won't be able to add more teams
actions.gameStartedMessage: Setup matchmaking in the Rounds tab to begin
actions.completeGameConfirmation: Are you sure you want to complete this tournament? This will finalize all scores and rankings.
actions.completeGameDisabledTooltip: All scores must be entered for every round before completing the game

teams.cannotAddTeamsAfterStart: Cannot add teams after tournament has started
teams.noTeams: No teams yet. Add your first team to get started!
teams.confirmDeleteTeam: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.
teams.confirmDeletePlayer: Are you sure you want to delete this player? This action cannot be undone.

rounds.noTables: No tables available for this round.
rounds.setupDescription: Click the button below to generate tables and player assignments for all rounds. This will use the backend matchmaking algorithm to distribute players fairly.
rounds.setupNotAvailableDescription: Matchmaking can only be set up when the game is in setup mode. This game has already started or been completed.
rounds.setupError: Failed to setup matchmaking. Please try again.
rounds.matchmakingInfo: Backend will handle matchmaking and create tables automatically

rankings.noScoresMessage: Rankings will appear here once you enter scores in the Rounds tab.
rankings.noScoresInstructions: Start by setting up matchmaking, then enter scores for each table.
